Class Window

java.lang.Object
Window
public class Window
extends java.lang.Object
This class has been created to add all the objects on the screen Polymorphism is used to add Planets / Moon / Asteroids which is then added into a SolarObjects Array A while (true) loop is used to create the animation on the screen

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Window()
    Window.java Constructor - When called the following methods are called

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addAsteroids()
    Add Asteroids to the array Speed is randomised between 1 and 10 If iteration is on a odd number, speed = speed * -1 to make it orbit the other direction Distance is randomised
    void addMoons()
    Add Moons to Array
    void addPlanets()
    Add Planets to Array
    void addSun()
    Add Sun to Array
    void run()
    Run Method Contains a infinite loop which adds all the planets to the window Runs Move method which changes the angle Update method to create animation

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
